title: Teaching Methodology Practical Skills Enhancement: Blended Learning Design Tool Utilization for Language Education Course Design

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Blended learning design tools can generate visual learning designs for language education with over 80% accuracy.
At least three personalized educational strategies can be proposed based on analytical data provided by the tool.
Learners can compare traditional lesson plans with blended learning tool-based designs, explaining at least three strengths and weaknesses of each.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
